title: Grilled Brown Sugar-Mustard Chicken
directions: In a large bowl, mix mustard, brown sugar, allspice and pepper flakes. Remove 1/4 cup mixture for serving. Add chicken to remaining mixture; toss to coat.
Grill chicken, covered, over medium heat or broil 4 in. from heat 6-8 minutes on each side or until a thermometer reads 170Â°. Serve with reserved mustard mixture. Yield: 8 servings.
